hero.heading: Embed ready-to-issue cards and go live fast
hero.descrip: Launch ready-to-use, compliant multi-currency corporate cards without writing a single line of code.

clientMarquee.heading: Trusted by fintechs, startups, and  enterprises across MENA

productOverview1.heading: Why embedded cards
productOverview1.description: With our embedded cards, you’re not launching your branded cards. You're leveraging our off the shelf cards. Get everything prebuilt and ready to go - card issuance, compliance, spend controls, and real-time tracking. You control the user experience without the investment.

features.title: Built for Scale. Secured for Trust. Ready for any Launch.
features.description: Whether you're embedding cards or launching your own card program, we power both.

features.title: One contract for everything
features.description: Work with just one provider to get technology, compliance, operational support, and more.

features.title: One integration, multiple markets
features.description: Go live across markets with a single integration.

features.title: Compliance, sorted
features.description: KYC, AML, and regulatory approvals to ensure end to end compliance.

features.title: Security at the core
features.description: PCI-DSS compliant with encryption, tokenization, and secure APIs.

features.title: Infrastructure that grows with you
features.description: Handle high volumes, custom logic, and complex workflows with ease.

features.title: Made for developers
features.description: Get started faster with detailed API documentation and sandbox access.

whatwedo.title: Discover SimpliFi APIs
whatwedo.description: We're PCI DSS compliant and follow strict AML/KYC protocols. All card data is tokenized and monitored in real time to prevent fraud.

highlights.title: Virtual and physical cards issued through your own platform
APIs to issue, track, and control spend

highlights.title: Built-in compliance, KYC, and card scheme approvals
Scalable infrastructure for platforms and ERPs

whatwedo.footer: We invest in security, privacy, and compliance so you can focus on growing your business.

useCases.title: Everything an embedded solution can do for you
useCases.descrip: With our embedded cards, you’re not launching your branded cards. You're leveraging our off the shelf cards. Get everything prebuilt and ready to go - card issuance, compliance, spend controls, and  real-time tracking. You control the user experience without the investment. From employee expenses to supplier payments, you stay in           control while we do the heavy lifting.

features.title: Multi-currency wallets
features.description: Fund, hold, and move money in USD, AED, SAR, BHD, KWD, QAR, and OMR. Avoid FX loss and streamline regional and international spend.

features.title: Multi-currency cards
features.description: Issue and manage cards across currencies using a single integration. Enable seamless spend across markets with built-in currency controls.

features.title: Card management features
features.description: Let your users issue cards, set spend limits, track transactions, and freeze cards in real time through your own interface.

features.title: Budget controls
features.description: Support company-wide budgets and keep spend aligned with business goals.

footer.heading: Plug in and go live in days!
footer.subheading: You bring the use case. We’ll handle the infrastructure.
